alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued February 23 at 1:07PM PST until February 25 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM PST THURSDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 17 expected. For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 18 possible. * WHERE...Antelope Valley. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 9 AM PST Thursday. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from late Thursday night through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Damage to outdoor plumbing possible. Expect severe damage to crops or sensitive vegetation, and harm to unprotected pets or livestock.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
